description: Johnny Hanson comes home to find a resting Chad Knight and apologizes for treating him badly. The two kiss and make up, with Hanson whispering to his lover as they give one of the most memorable pairings Falcon has produced. Hanson asks Knight to look at him as he sucks, then fucks him to close the scene.
series: The Other Side Of Aspen IV: The Rescue
title: The Other Side Of Aspen IV:  The Rescue
